# AutoArchitect v2.6 Documentation

Project one-liner: Enterprise AI Workflow Suite for synthesis, audit, and deployment.

## Core Documentation Entry Points
- [docs/DOC_POLICY.md](docs/DOC_POLICY.md): Governance and provenance rules.
- [docs/SECURITY.md](docs/SECURITY.md): Threat model and safety protocols.
- [docs/ARCHITECTURE.md](docs/ARCHITECTURE.md): System design and data flow.
- [docs/FRAMEWORK.md](docs/FRAMEWORK.md): Implementation stack.
- [docs/CHANGELOG.md](docs/CHANGELOG.md): Project history.
- [docs/AGENTS_DOCUMENTATION_AUTHORITY.md](docs/AGENTS_DOCUMENTATION_AUTHORITY.md): System prompt for docs agents.

## Full Context
- [llms-full.txt](llms-full.txt): Deterministically assembled context of all markdown docs.
